dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform
Class XFormPage

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.lib2.platform.AbstractExecutableExtension
      dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.page.AbstractPage
          dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform.XFormPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform.internal.IXFormPage, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension
public class XFormPage
extends AbstractPage
implements dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform.internal.IXFormPage

This class represents a single page wizard that creates its GUI from an XForm XML model.

The default implementation query the page description from the XML file given in the extension-point: 

  <extension
  point="dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.plugin.guidedconfigwizard">
  <guidedconfigwizard 
  id="draft">
  <gui class="dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform.XFormPage">
  <parameter name="pageDescription" value="ui/MySinglePage.xml"/>
  </gui>
  </guidedconfigwizard>
  </extension>

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2009.a

doInit

public void doInit(AbstractBackend backend)
            throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
Parses the model from the input file queried from the extension-point.

The default implementation queries the parameter IXFormPage.PARAMETER_PAGE_DESCRIPTION from the extension-point registration of the page to find a file inside the defining plug-in.

Overrides:
doInit in class AbstractPage
Parameters:
backend - The AbstractBackend of the wizard
Throws:
dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
Since:
2009.a

isFile

protected boolean isFile(java.lang.String plugIn,
                         java.lang.String path)
Query if the given file exists in the given plug-in.

This method can only resolve files in plug-ins that are no jar files.

Parameters:
plugIn - the plug-in ID
path - the path to resolve
Returns:
true if the file exists
Since:
2009.a

getFile

protected java.io.File getFile(java.lang.String plugIn,
                               java.lang.String path)
                        throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
Get the file at the given path in the given plug-in.

This method can only resolve a file if the plug-in is no jar file. If the file cannot be accessed an error is issued.

Parameters:
plugIn - the plug-in to search in
path - The path to search
Returns:
the file or null on error
Throws:
dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException - on error
Since:
2009.a

                                      throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
Resolves the given path inside the given plug-in id to a stream.

If the path cannot be resolved to a stream an error is issued.

path - The relative path
Returns:
The stream or null on error

doCreateControls

protected void doCreateControls(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent)
Creates the page GUI from the parsed model accessible via getModel() by recursivly stepping through the model and creating the GUI via AbstractWidgetDescriptions.addWidget(Composite, WidgetModel) of the page.

For each created widget doAdaptWidget(ISWTWidget) is called.

Overrides:
doCreateControls in class AbstractPage
Parameters:
parent - The composite to place the GUI in
Since:
2009.a
See Also:
AbstractPage.doCreateControls(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite)
